title: How to Make Macaroni and Cheese Using Cheez Whiz

steps.title: Prepare the macaroni according to the package instructions.
steps.content: Prepare the macaroni according to the package instructions.

steps.title: Drain well, make sure not a single macaroni noodle goes with the water.
steps.content: Drain well, make sure not a single macaroni noodle goes with the water.

steps.title: When it is still in the pot, add half a bottle of Cheez Whiz or more.
steps.content: When it is still in the pot, add half a bottle of Cheez Whiz or more.

steps.title: Since the macaroni is hot, it will be easy to melt.
steps.content: Since the macaroni is hot, it will be easy to melt.

steps.title: Fold the cheese into the noodles on low heat.
steps.content: Fold the cheese into the noodles on low heat.

steps.title: Taste it, first.
steps.content: Taste it, first. Then add salt and pepper, if needed.

steps.title: Put in on a bowl and serve!
steps.content: Put in on a bowl and serve!
